root.name: Speedy Gonzales in Los Gatos Bandidos
root.description: The Title Screen.Based off the popular Loony Toons cartoon, Los Gatos Bandidos features side scrolling levels where players to control Speedy Gonzales and run around at high speeds in a fashion similar to the Sonic series, rescuing their mice brethren that have been captured by Sylvester el gato and his gang of "Bandidos". the game allows the player also to return to the previous stage visited to improve score.Levels Fiesta City. Sleepy Rock (2 parts)Surely Wood (3 parts, boss)Fiesta City (2 parts)Ancient Keep (2 parts)Snowy Cabins (2 parts)Galactical Galaxies 2 parts, boss)Ye Olde Bounty (2 parts, final boss, bonus stage)

similar_games.game: Tiny Toon Adventures: Buster Busts Loose!
